Package org.apache.jk.core

Jk2 interfaces Core interfaces for jk2, similar with the interfaces defined in the C side ( jk2/include ).

JkHandler

Package org.apache.jk.core Description

Jk2 interfaces

Core interfaces for jk2, similar with the interfaces defined in the C side ( jk2/include ).

The implementations are in common/ and server/.
